channel.title: A Couple Things
channel.description:
I was wondering..
1. How would I make it so that when I for example.. Update my cache \ client, the client thats downloaded currently sends a thing like "There is an update for this client, would you like to update "YES, NO"
2. How would I change my max levels from 99 to say.. 120? :)
Thanks --

item.title: A Couple Things
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

You could make the Client ask the server for a revision, and if the server has a higher revision (You could change that up manually) It would ask you to update… Wouldn’t it?
It shouldn’t be too hard, it could be a little tricky, but It can be done if you know what you’re doing

and for the second one use the search bar im pretty sure there are tutorials on that

Goodluck

Read full topic
